job_tasks.phrase: Crafting cutting-edge web applications with premier libraries and tools.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly describes the creation of software applications using development tools.

job_tasks.phrase: Enhancing cloud-native backends with the latest AWS serverless technologies.
job_tasks.justification: This describes the development and improvement of backend systems, specifically mentioning cloud technologies.

job_tasks.phrase: Conducting thorough code reviews to uphold best practices, team standards, and client needs.
job_tasks.justification: Code reviews are a standard part of the software development lifecycle to ensure quality and adherence to standards.

job_tasks.phrase: AI-driven solutions that redefine learning and personal growth.
job_tasks.justification: This indicates an understanding of how the technical solutions align with business goals of transforming education and personal development.

job_tasks.phrase: automated routine tasks, allowing you to concentrate on impactful development and problem-solving.
job_tasks.justification: This highlights the business benefit of automation and the strategic focus on high-impact development.

soft_skills.phrase: crafting features that leave a mark
collaborating with a diverse, talented global team

classification.rationale: While the role mentions AI-driven solutions and uses the term 'generative AI', the core responsibilities and tasks described are focused on traditional web application development and backend enhancement. There is no mention of specific generative AI techniques like prompt engineering, RAG, or fine-tuning, which are central to the GenAI Engineer profile.
